snippet: A Turkish helicopter plunged into a house in the Afghan capital on Friday, killing at least 12 NATO service members and two civilians, officials said.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: A Turkish helicopter plunged into a house in the Afghan capital on Friday, killing at least 12 NATO service members and two civilians, officials said.

headline.main: Turkish Helicopter Crashes, Killing at Least 12 NATO Troops in Afghanistan

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: UNITED STATES DEFENSE AND MILITARY FORCES
